dmca.title: Cease and Desist and Notice of DMCA Claim of Infringement Notice ID: 24-176750
dmca.body:
Please note that the web site referenced in your DMCA notice does not
reside within our network as of 10:25:31 a.m. (GMT-6) on April 13, 2006.
 
Legal Response Team
The Planet

-----Original Message-----
From: antipiracy@titanmedia.com [mailto:antipiracy@titanmedia.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, April 12, 2006 11:44 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: Cease and Desist and Notice of DMCA Claim of Infringement
Notice ID: 24-176750

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

To: THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES

Notice ID: 24-176750


From: Gill Sperlein, General Counsel, Titan Media, Inc.

Date: 12 Apr 2006 16:30:32 GMT

Re:         Cease and Desist and Notice of DMCA Claim of Infringement
               Request for Removal of AudioVisual Files from your Webserver/s or
network.
                Request for denial of service to the account of the
infringing user

All of the above listed entities and hosting companies are hereby given
notice valid under copyright infringement notification requirements of 17
U.S.C section 512.

I am the designated agent of the owner of the copyrights of the images and
audio/visual works listed below. I believe that the images and audio/visual
works listed at the times cited below were used by the user listed below and
identified by the infringing IP address below in a manner that was not
authorized by the owner of the copyrights, its agent or the law.

Verified and documented infringements that have been traced to URLs and/or
IP Address's controlled by your company are listed below.

We demand that upon receipt of this notification of claimed infringement you
expeditiously remove, or disable access to, the below claimed infringing
material/s and any other Titan Media property residing on your
network/system.

I certify under penalty of perjury that I have a good faith belief that the
information contained in this notification is accurate to the best of my
knowledge and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the
aforementioned copyright protected materials.

Please advise me when the offending images have been removed  or access has
been blocked so that we may re-inspect for compliance.   

We also request that as per your TOS and/or AUP statements you remove the
infringing account from your network to prevent further acts of infringement
from occurring.  The acts of copyright infringement committed by this
account are Federal offenses and ones that should not be taken lightly.  Any
additional or further violation by this account will be prosecuted and
expose your company to potential liability as previous notice has been given
and you have been made aware of the infringing acts related to this account
within your network.
 
This letter does not constitute an exhaustive statement of TITAN Media's
legal position nor is it a waiver of any of our rights and/or remedies in
this or any other matter, all of which are expressly reserved.  Your
immediate attention to this matter is expected and appreciated.



Sincerely,



D. Gill Sperlein, esq.           
General Counsel, TITAN Media Inc.
69 Converse Street
San Francisco, CA 94103

415-487-1211 X32

Notice ID: 24-176750

Evidence: 

Infringing Files that must be removed and/or blocked from access are:

Title: Chapters
Infringement Source: eDonkey
Infringement Timestamp: 11 Apr 2006 17:50:26 GMT Infringement Last
Documented: 11 Apr 2006 23:21:12 GMT Infringer Username:
HighID|1179867010|73C682CD480E3896AA393C30356E6F57
Infringing Filename: - Titan'S Chapters - W Blake Harper Jason Branch Dean
Coulter-Hot!!!!!.mpg Infringing Filesize: 846375236 Infringer IP Address:
70.83.87.130 Infringer DNS Name: modemcable130.87-83-70.mc.videotron.ca
Infringing URL: ed2k://|file|- Titan'S Chapters - W Blake Harper Jason
Branch Dean
Coulter-Hot!!!!!.mpg|846375236|24657C3D32537666E316AC01F83CA250|/
